- She has recently changed to a new job.
- Her new job requires her to answer many phone calls each day.
- She speaks a lot at work, leading to her feeling thirsty.
- She doesn't have time to drink water during work hours.
- She tends to drink more water once she returns home.

The translation of the Chinese text to English is:

32. The child in the photo is chubby and so cute! 
Yes, this is my uncle's son, he is two years old this year. My aunt also has a son, who is five years older than him. 
So, he must be in first grade, right? How old is your aunt's son this year?
